scripts.test: npm run test:jest && npm run test:visual
scripts.build: rm -rf dist && mkdir dist && cp src/index.js dist & cp src/names.js dist & cp src/random.js dist & cp src/locations.js dist & cp src/assetLoader.js dist & cp src/languages.js dist & cp src/utils.js dist & cp src/randomizer.js dist && npm pack --dry-run
